DOC.brief_title: A Study Grazoprevir ( MK-5172 ) Hepatitis C-Infected Male Participants ( MK-5172-004 )
DOC.criteria: Baseline health stable . Has clinical diagnosis chronic HCV infection . Has history stroke chronic seizure . Has history cancer . Has history human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection . Has major surgery , donate blood participate another investigational study within past 3 month .
